page.title: 01General Review
page.content: This 4km x 3km area, reference 03120135 is dissected by the main A358 Taunton to Minehead road, and has at its centre the village of Crowcombe, which is some 6 kilometres south-east of Williton. It is an area of outstanding natural beauty, having to the north-east the gentle slopes of the Quantock Hills, and to the south-west the Brendon Hills. Much of the land is privately owned and is part of the Trollope-Bellew estate. There is an interesting mixture of architectural styles ranging from the 15th century Church House to modern day houses.
